useCase.name: Create EventBus Bolt Bundle Resources
useCase.description: Create a bundle for AI resources in the application

preconditions.precondition: The necessary resources and policies files are available

mainSequence.step: Application Developer sends AIS No Contact request
Sentient Agent Bundle Resources creates a bundle named Ship1 with file location ./projects/AISSimulator/AISShip/bundle.js
Sentient Agent Bundle Resources communicates with EventBus to create Ship1 bundle
Sentient Agent Bundle Resources creates a bundle named NoContact with file location ./projects/AISSimulator/AISNoContact/bundle.js
Sentient Agent Bundle Resources communicates with EventBus to create NoContact bundle
Sentient Agent Bundle Resources creates a bundle named Agg1 with file location ./projects/AISSimulator/AISAgg/bundle.js
Sentient Agent Bundle Resources communicates with EventBus to create Agg1 bundle
Sentient Agent Bundle Resources creates a bundle named Viewer1 with file location ./projects/AISSimulator/AISViewer/bundle.js
Sentient Agent Bundle Resources communicates with EventBus to create Viewer1 bundle
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager creates policy files using ./projects/AISSimulator/AISShip/policies.js
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager communicates with EventBus to create policies
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager deploys Viewer1 bundle with realtime policies
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager communicates with EventBus to deploy Viewer1 bundle
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager deploys NoContact bundle with realtime policies and timeout parameter set to 10000
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager communicates with EventBus to deploy NoContact bundle
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager deploys Agg1 bundle with realtime policies
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager communicates with EventBus to deploy Agg1 bundle
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager deploys Ship1 bundle with realtime policies and sourceFile parameter set to ../AIS_Simulator/ships/215071000A.csv
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager communicates with EventBus to deploy Ship1 bundle
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager deploys Ship1 bundle with realtime policies and sourceFile parameter set to ../AIS_Simulator/ships/215031000A.csv
Sentient Agent Bundle Manager communicates with EventBus to deploy Ship1 bundle
